DOC.brief_summary: The purpose show 5 mg Form IV tablet AG-013736 produce similar drug concentration plasma compare 5 mg Form XLI tablet AG-013736 oral dose fed condition .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Of AG-013736 Tablets Under Fed Conditions In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: To establish bioequivalence Form IV Form XLI AG-013736 tablet
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 47 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) clinical laboratory test ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative Evidence significant disease blood , kidney , endocrine system , lung , gastrointestinal , heart , liver , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude season allergy ) Use tobacco nicotine containing product ( positive urine cotinine test ) . Pregnant nursing female females childbearing potential include tubal ligation
